hexxyfour.page.quenching_allays.update: I- I feel them resisting me. I feel them pushing back. I feel like I faintly remember their cost of flaying. But now it has changed. Has $(o)Nature/$ turned its back on me? Changing the cost as a cruel, cruel punishment? $(br2)I... I now know the cost of Flaying Allays is now equal to 150 $(l:items/amethyst)$(item)Amethyst Dust/$.
